name: Flair Labs
long_description: Flair Labs is the leading AI communications platform for real estate and lending, empowering teams to build autonomous agents that execute complex workflows across voice and text. We believe the next generation of top real estate teams will be responsible for managing swarms of agents that execute tasks on their behalf â€“ Flair Agent platform is the foundation enabling this future.
one_liner: The world's first digital concierge for real estate and lending
